table.name: batiment
table.remarks: Batiments du département

table.name: bo_client
table.remarks: Boites optiques provenants du client / données avant vente
table.viewSql: SELECT b.bo_id, b.geom, b.id_bpe, b.id_nro, b.id_sro, b.reseau, b.fonction, b.id_cable, b.nat_cable, b.implant, b.mode_pose, b.id_pa, b.zone, b.etat, b.nb_soud, b.type_pf, c.num_equipe_piq, c.num_equipe_aig, c.num_equipe_gc FROM ((athd.t_bo a JOIN athd.t_bo_client b ON ((a.bo_id = b.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt c ON ((c.pt_id = a.pt_id))) GROUP BY b.bo_id, b.geom, b.id_bpe, b.id_nro, b.id_sro, b.reseau, b.fonction, b.id_cable, b.nat_cable, b.implant, b.mode_pose, b.id_pa, b.zone, b.etat, b.nb_soud, b.type_pf, c.num_equipe_piq, c.num_equipe_aig, c.num_equipe_gc;

table.name: bo_etude
table.remarks: Boites optiques projetés en étude (doit être remplassé par bo_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: SELECT b.bo_id, c.geom, b.pt_id, b.pt_sptyp, b.pt_spcode, b.pt_code, b.pt_type, b.pt_nbel, b.pt_nbel_2, b.pt_sro, b.pt_ptam, b.pt_com, b.pt_comment, b.pt_creadat, b.pt_majdat, b.annee, b.zanro, b.zapm, b.secteur, b.cbl_ent, b.pt_ln_d1, b.etr, b.za_umftte, b.pt_etat, b.pt_pbtyp, b.pt_nbumod, b.pt_nbequip, b.zapa, b.nb_epissur, b.pt_ln_d2, b.dpt, b.pt_fonc, b.pt_ln_tr, b.objectid, b.libelle_in, b.insee_2, b.commune, b.id_pc, b.cox, b.coy, b.nb_acces, b.nb_ls, b.nb_deg, b.comment, c.num_equipe_piq, c.num_equipe_aig, c.num_equipe_gc FROM ((athd.t_bo a JOIN athd.t_bo_etude b ON ((a.bo_id = b.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt c ON ((c.pt_id = a.pt_id))) GROUP BY b.bo_id, c.geom, b.pt_id, b.pt_sptyp, b.pt_spcode, b.pt_code, b.pt_type, b.pt_nbel, b.pt_sro, b.pt_ptam, b.pt_com, b.pt_comment, b.pt_creadat, b.pt_majdat, b.annee, b.zanro, b.zapm, b.secteur, b.cbl_ent, b.pt_ln_d1, b.etr, b.za_umftte, b.pt_pbtyp, b.pt_nbumod, b.pt_nbequip, b.zapa, b.nb_epissur, b.pt_ln_d2, b.dpt, b.pt_fonc, b.pt_ln_tr, b.objectid, b.libelle_in, b.insee_2, b.commune, b.id_pc, b.cox, b.coy, b.nb_acces, b.nb_ls, b.nb_deg, b.comment, c.num_equipe_piq, c.num_equipe_aig, c.num_equipe_gc;

table.name: bo_etude_auto
table.remarks: Boites optiques projetés en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.bo_id, c.geom, b.pt_id, CASE WHEN ((c.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (c.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'CHAMBRE ORANGE'::text WHEN ((c.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (c.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) THEN 'POTEAU ORANGE'::text WHEN ((c.gestionnaire = 'ENEDIS'::text) AND (c.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) THEN 'POTEAU ENEDIS'::text WHEN ((c.gestionnaire = 'ATHD'::text) AND (c.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'CHAMBRE ATHD'::text WHEN ((c.gestionnaire = 'ATHD'::text) AND (c.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) THEN 'POTEAU ATHD'::text WHEN ((d.pt_id IS NOT NULL) AND (c.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) THEN 'APPUI A CREER'::text WHEN ((d.pt_id IS NOT NULL) AND (c.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'CHAMBRE A CREER'::text WHEN (c.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) THEN 'CHAMBRE TIERS'::text WHEN (c.structure = 'APPUI'::text) THEN 'POTEAU TIERS'::text WHEN (c.structure = 'FACADE'::text) THEN 'FACADE'::text WHEN (c.structure = 'IMMEUBLE'::text) THEN 'IMMEUBLE'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS pt_sptyp, CASE WHEN ((length(c.nom) > 0) AND (length((c.insee)::text) = 5) AND (c.nom <> 'A DETERMINER'::text)) THEN ((c.nom || '/'::text) || c.insee) ELSE NULL::text END AS pt_spcode, b.pt_code, b.pt_type, b.pt_nbel, b.pt_nbel_2, b.pt_pbtyp, CASE WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PBI'::text) THEN (((b.pt_nbel)::integer / 4))::numeric WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PB6'::text) THEN (1)::numeric WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PB12'::text) THEN (2)::numeric WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PBR'::text) THEN b.pt_nbumod WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PRE'::text) THEN (((b.pt_nbel)::integer / 5))::numeric ELSE NULL::numeric END AS pt_nbumod, CASE WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PBI'::text) THEN ((b.pt_nbel)::integer / 4) WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PB6'::text) THEN 1 WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PB12'::text) THEN 1 WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PBR'::text) THEN 1 WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PRE'::text) THEN 1 ELSE NULL::integer END AS pt_nbequip, h.za_code AS pt_sro, CASE WHEN (b.pt_type = 'PEP TR'::text) THEN f.za_code WHEN (b.pt_type = 'PEP D1'::text) THEN h.za_code WHEN (b.pt_type = 'PEP D2'::text) THEN j.za_code WHEN (b.pt_type = 'PB'::text) THEN j.za_code WHEN (b.pt_type = 'PR'::text) THEN j.za_code WHEN (b.pt_type = 'PA'::text) THEN h.za_code ELSE NULL::text END AS pt_ptam, k.id AS pt_com, b.pt_comment, b.pt_creadat, b.pt_majdat, NULL::text AS annee, f.za_code AS zanro, CASE WHEN ((b.pt_type = 'PB'::text) OR (b.pt_type = 'PA'::text)) THEN h.za_code ELSE NULL::text END AS zapm, CASE WHEN (b.pt_type = 'PB'::text) THEN j.za_code ELSE NULL::text END AS zapa, g.type AS secteur, CASE WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PBI'::text) THEN ((((b.pt_nbel)::integer / 4) * 6))::numeric WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PB6'::text) THEN (6)::numeric WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PB12'::text) THEN (12)::numeric WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PBR'::text) THEN (b.pt_nbumod * (6)::numeric) WHEN (b.pt_pbtyp = 'PRE'::text) THEN ((((b.pt_nbel)::integer / 5) * 6))::numeric ELSE (b.cbl_ent)::numeric END AS cbl_ent, b.nb_epissur, b.pt_ln_d2, NULL::text AS etr, '43'::text AS dpt, b.pt_fonc, b.pt_ln_d1, b.za_umftte, b.pt_etat FROM ((((((((((athd.t_bo a JOIN athd.t_bo_etude b ON ((a.bo_id = b.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt c ON ((c.pt_id = a.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt_projection_gc d ON ((d.pt_id = a.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro e ON (st_intersects(c.geom, e.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro_etude f ON ((f.znro_id = e.znro_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm g ON (st_intersects(c.geom, g.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude h ON ((h.zpm_id = g.zpm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpa i ON (st_intersects(c.geom, i.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpa_etude j ON ((j.zpa_id = i.zpa_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.commune k ON (st_intersects(c.geom, k.geom))) GROUP BY g.type, b.bo_id, c.nom, k.id, c.insee, c.geom, f.za_code, h.za_code, j.za_code, b.pt_id, b.pt_sptyp, b.pt_spcode, b.pt_code, b.pt_type, b.pt_nbel, b.pt_sro, b.pt_ptam, b.pt_com, b.pt_comment, b.pt_creadat, b.pt_majdat, b.annee, b.zanro, b.zapm, b.secteur, b.cbl_ent, b.pt_ln_d1, b.etr, b.za_umftte, b.pt_pbtyp, b.pt_nbumod, b.pt_nbequip, b.zapa, b.nb_epissur, b.pt_ln_d2, b.dpt, b.pt_fonc, b.pt_ln_tr, b.objectid, b.libelle_in, b.insee_2, b.commune, b.id_pc, b.cox, b.coy, b.nb_acces, b.nb_ls, b.nb_deg, b.comment, c.gestionnaire, c.structure, d.pt_id;

table.name: bo_fiabilisation_etude
table.remarks: Boites optiques etude à fiabiliser sur le terrain
table.viewSql: SELECT a.bo_id, c.geom, a.pt_id, d.pt_code, d.pt_type, b.avancement_terrain, b.commentaire_terrain, b.url, b.elag_id, b.avancement_etude, b.commentaire_etude FROM (((athd.t_bo a JOIN athd.t_bo_fiabilisation_etude b ON ((a.bo_id = b.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_bo_etude d ON ((a.bo_id = d.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt c ON ((c.pt_id = a.pt_id)));

table.name: bo_fiabilisation_exi
table.remarks: Boites optiques existantes à fiabiliser sur le terrain
table.viewSql: SELECT a.bo_id, c.geom, b.avancement, b.nb_reserve, d.pt_code, d.cbl_ent, b.commentaire, b.nc_etat, b.nc_type, b.nc_date_envoi, b.nc_retour_client, b.nc_commentaire FROM (((athd.t_bo a JOIN athd.t_bo_fiabilisation_exi b ON ((a.bo_id = b.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_bo_etude d ON ((a.bo_id = d.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt c ON ((c.pt_id = a.pt_id)));

table.name: bo_georeso
table.remarks: Boites optiques présentes dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.bo_id, b.geom, c.pt_id, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.type_site, b.code_site, b.siteid, b.type_pf, b.operateur, b.commentair, b.nom_nro, b.type_pf_pe, b.code_pf_pe, b.projet_cod, b.type_peo, b.nb_sortie_, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.date_pmpa, b.nb_coupleu, b.nb_coupl_1, b.id_refsi, b.id_regleme, b.code_sd, b.vers_ingen, b.rome_ok, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.id_ftth, b.reseau, b.id_ftth_pf, b.id_refsi_p, b.id_refsi_1, b.date_publi, b.demande_id, c.num_equipe_piq, c.num_equipe_aig, c.num_equipe_gc FROM ((athd.t_bo a JOIN athd.t_bo_georeso b ON ((a.bo_id = b.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt c ON ((c.pt_id = a.pt_id))) GROUP BY b.bo_id, c.geom, c.pt_id, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.type_site, b.code_site, b.siteid, b.type_pf, b.operateur, b.commentair, b.nom_nro, b.type_pf_pe, b.code_pf_pe, b.projet_cod, b.type_peo, b.nb_sortie_, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.date_pmpa, b.nb_coupleu, b.nb_coupl_1, b.id_refsi, b.id_regleme, b.code_sd, b.vers_ingen, b.rome_ok, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.id_ftth, b.reseau, b.id_ftth_pf, b.id_refsi_p, b.id_refsi_1, b.date_publi, b.demande_id, c.num_equipe_piq, c.num_equipe_aig, c.num_equipe_gc;

table.name: bo_travaux
table.remarks: Boites optiques à traiter en travaux
table.viewSql: SELECT d.bo_id, c.geom, b.avancement, b.pose_date_prev, b.pose_equipe, b.pose_date, b.laser_date_prev, b.laser_equipe, b.laser_date, b.mesure_date_prev, b.mesure_equipe, b.mesure_date, b.commentaire FROM (((((athd.t_bo a JOIN athd.t_bo_etude d ON ((a.bo_id = d.bo_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_bo_travaux b ON ((a.bo_id = b.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt c ON ((c.pt_id = a.pt_id))) JOIN athd.t_zpm e ON (st_intersects(c.geom, e.geom))) JOIN athd.t_zpm_suivi f ON ((e.zpm_id = f.zpm_id))) WHERE (f.etude_exe_date_validation_ran IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY d.bo_id, c.geom, b.avancement, b.pose_date_prev, b.pose_equipe, b.pose_date, b.laser_date_prev, b.laser_equipe, b.laser_date, b.mesure_date_prev, b.mesure_equipe, b.mesure_date, b.commentaire;

table.name: ca
table.remarks: Ensemble des lignes issuent de la production C3A

table.name: capft
table.remarks: Ensemble des calculs CAPFT produits

table.name: cb_bt
table.remarks: Câbles Enedis existants

table.name: cb_client
table.remarks: Câbles optiques provenants du client / données avant vente
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cb_id, b.geom, b.id_cable, b.id_nro, b.id_sro, b.reseau, b.fonction, b.nature, b.nb_prise, b.fo_pb, b.top_bpe, b.implant, b.longueur, b.capacite, b.module, b.id_pa, b.zone, b.mode_pose, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_piq, ''::text) AS num_equipe_piq, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_aig, ''::text) AS num_equipe_aig, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_gc, ''::text) AS num_equipe_gc FROM ((athd.t_cb a JOIN athd.t_cb_client b ON ((a.cb_id = b.cb_id))) JOIN athd.t_cm c ON ((c.cm_id = ANY (a.cm_id)))) GROUP BY b.cb_id, b.geom, b.id_cable, b.id_nro, b.id_sro, b.reseau, b.fonction, b.nature, b.nb_prise, b.fo_pb, b.top_bpe, b.implant, b.longueur, b.capacite, b.module, b.id_pa, b.zone, b.mode_pose;

table.name: cb_etude
table.remarks: Câbles optiques projetés en étude (doit être remplassé par cb_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: WITH cm_existence_check AS ( SELECT a_1.cb_id, CASE WHEN (count(cm_check_1.cm_id) < array_length(a_1.cm_id, 1)) THEN 'CM_ID_INEXISTANT'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS cm_erreur FROM ((athd.t_cb a_1 JOIN athd.t_cb_etude ON ((a_1.cb_id = t_cb_etude.cb_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_cm cm_check_1 ON ((cm_check_1.cm_id = ANY (a_1.cm_id)))) GROUP BY a_1.cb_id, a_1.cm_id ) SELECT b.cb_id, array_agg(DISTINCT c.cm_id) AS cm_id, CASE WHEN (cm_check.cm_erreur IS NOT NULL) THEN NULL::geometry WHEN (st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c.geom))) = 1) THEN st_linemerge(st_union(c.geom)) ELSE NULL::geometry END AS geom, CASE WHEN (cm_check.cm_erreur IS NOT NULL) THEN 'CM INEXISTANT'::text WHEN (st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c.geom))) = 1) THEN NULL::text ELSE 'INVALIDE'::text END AS erreur, b.cb_code, b.cb_troncon, b.cb_nd1, b.cb_nd2, b.cb_tr_nd1, b.cb_tr_nd2, b.cb_capafo, b.cb_modulo, b.cb_diam, b.cb_fonc, b.cb_pose, b.cb_com, b.cb_long, b.cb_comment, b.cb_creadat, b.cb_majdat, b.annee, b.secteur, b.zanro, b.zapm, b.zapa, b.etr, b.cb_etat, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_piq, ''::text) AS num_equipe_piq, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_aig, ''::text) AS num_equipe_aig, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_gc, ''::text) AS num_equipe_gc, b.inverser_geom FROM (((athd.t_cb a JOIN athd.t_cb_etude b ON ((a.cb_id = b.cb_id))) JOIN athd.t_cm c ON ((c.cm_id = ANY (a.cm_id)))) LEFT JOIN cm_existence_check cm_check ON ((b.cb_id = cm_check.cb_id))) GROUP BY b.cb_id, b.cb_code, b.cb_troncon, b.cb_nd1, b.cb_nd2, b.cb_tr_nd1, b.cb_tr_nd2, b.cb_capafo, b.cb_modulo, b.cb_diam, b.cb_fonc, b.cb_pose, b.cb_com, b.cb_long, b.cb_comment, b.cb_creadat, b.cb_majdat, b.annee, b.secteur, b.zanro, b.zapm, b.zapa, b.etr, b.cb_etat, cm_check.cm_erreur;

table.name: cb_etude_auto
table.remarks: Câbles optiques projetés en étude
table.viewSql: WITH cm_existence_check AS ( SELECT a_1.cb_id, CASE WHEN (count(cm_check_1.cm_id) < array_length(a_1.cm_id, 1)) THEN 'CM_ID_INEXISTANT'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS cm_erreur FROM ((athd.t_cb a_1 JOIN athd.t_cb_etude ON ((a_1.cb_id = t_cb_etude.cb_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_cm cm_check_1 ON ((cm_check_1.cm_id = ANY (a_1.cm_id)))) GROUP BY a_1.cb_id, a_1.cm_id ), geom_cable AS ( SELECT b_1.cb_id, array_agg(DISTINCT c_1.cm_id) AS cm_id, CASE WHEN (cm_check.cm_erreur IS NOT NULL) THEN NULL::geometry WHEN ((st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c_1.geom))) = 1) AND (b_1.inverser_geom IS NOT TRUE)) THEN st_linemerge(st_union(c_1.geom)) WHEN ((st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c_1.geom))) = 1) AND (b_1.inverser_geom IS TRUE)) THEN st_reverse(st_linemerge(st_union(c_1.geom))) ELSE NULL::geometry END AS geom, CASE WHEN (cm_check.cm_erreur IS NOT NULL) THEN 'CM INEXISTANT'::text WHEN (st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c_1.geom))) = 1) THEN NULL::text ELSE 'INVALIDE'::text END AS erreur, b_1.cb_code, b_1.cb_capafo, b_1.cb_fonc, b_1.cb_comment, b_1.cb_creadat, b_1.cb_majdat, b_1.inverser_geom FROM (((athd.t_cb a_1 JOIN athd.t_cb_etude b_1 ON ((a_1.cb_id = b_1.cb_id))) JOIN athd.t_cm c_1 ON ((c_1.cm_id = ANY (a_1.cm_id)))) LEFT JOIN cm_existence_check cm_check ON ((b_1.cb_id = cm_check.cb_id))) GROUP BY b_1.cb_id, b_1.cb_code, b_1.cb_troncon, b_1.cb_nd1, b_1.cb_nd2, b_1.cb_tr_nd1, b_1.cb_tr_nd2, b_1.cb_capafo, b_1.cb_modulo, b_1.cb_diam, b_1.cb_fonc, b_1.cb_pose, b_1.cb_com, b_1.cb_long, b_1.cb_comment, b_1.cb_creadat, b_1.cb_majdat, b_1.annee, b_1.secteur, b_1.zanro, b_1.zapm, b_1.zapa, b_1.etr, cm_check.cm_erreur ) SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.cb_id) a.cb_id, a.cm_id, a.erreur, a.geom, a.cb_code, NULL::text AS cb_troncon, d.pt_code AS cb_nd1, g.pt_code AS cb_nd2, NULL::text AS cb_tr_nd1, NULL::text AS cb_tr_nd2, a.cb_capafo, CASE WHEN (a.cb_fonc = 'TR'::text) THEN 12 ELSE 6 END AS cb_modulo, NULL::text AS cb_diam, a.cb_fonc, NULL::text AS cb_pose, NULL::text AS cb_com, (st_length(a.geom))::integer AS cb_long, a.cb_comment, a.cb_creadat, a.cb_majdat, NULL::text AS annee, h.type AS secteur, k.za_code AS zanro, CASE WHEN ((a.cb_fonc = 'D1'::text) OR (a.cb_fonc = 'D2'::text)) THEN i.za_code ELSE NULL::text END AS zapm, CASE WHEN (a.cb_fonc = 'D2'::text) THEN m.za_code ELSE NULL::text END AS zapa, NULL::text AS etr, a.inverser_geom FROM ((((((((((((geom_cable a LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt b ON (st_dwithin(st_startpoint(a.geom), b.geom, (0.2)::double precision))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt_etude c ON ((c.pt_id = b.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_bo_etude d ON ((d.pt_id = c.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt e ON (st_dwithin(st_endpoint(a.geom), e.geom, (0.2)::double precision))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt_etude f ON ((f.pt_id = e.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_bo_etude g ON ((g.pt_id = f.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm h ON (st_intersects(a.geom, h.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude i ON ((h.zpm_id = i.zpm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro j ON (st_intersects(a.geom, j.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro_etude k ON ((j.znro_id = k.znro_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpa l ON (st_intersects(a.geom, l.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpa_etude m ON ((l.zpa_id = m.zpa_id)));

table.name: cb_etude_erreur_geom
table.remarks: Permet de visualiser les câbles avec erreur de géométrie (Ligne discontinue, cm inexistant, etc)
table.viewSql: WITH cm_existence_check AS ( SELECT a_1.cb_id, CASE WHEN (count(cm_check_1.cm_id) < array_length(a_1.cm_id, 1)) THEN 'CM_ID_INEXISTANT'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS cm_erreur FROM ((athd.t_cb a_1 JOIN athd.t_cb_etude ON ((a_1.cb_id = t_cb_etude.cb_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_cm cm_check_1 ON ((cm_check_1.cm_id = ANY (a_1.cm_id)))) GROUP BY a_1.cb_id, a_1.cm_id ) SELECT b.cb_id, array_agg(DISTINCT c.cm_id) AS cm_id, st_collect(c.geom) AS geom, CASE WHEN (cm_check.cm_erreur IS NOT NULL) THEN 'CM INEXISTANT'::text WHEN (st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c.geom))) <> 1) THEN 'INVALIDE'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS erreur FROM (((athd.t_cb a JOIN athd.t_cb_etude b ON ((a.cb_id = b.cb_id))) JOIN athd.t_cm c ON ((c.cm_id = ANY (a.cm_id)))) LEFT JOIN cm_existence_check cm_check ON ((b.cb_id = cm_check.cb_id))) GROUP BY b.cb_id, cm_check.cm_erreur HAVING ((st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c.geom))) <> 1) OR (cm_check.cm_erreur IS NOT NULL));

table.name: cb_georeso
table.remarks: Câbles optiques présents dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cb_id, b.geom, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.type_site_, b.code_site_, b.type_sit_1, b.code_sit_1, b.code_proje, b.commentair, b.type_longu, b.diametre, b.nb_fibre, b.operateur, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.id_refsi, b.usage_ftth, b.usage_rome, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.longueur, b.type_cable, b.type_lon_1, b.id_ftth, b.reseau, b.famille, b.famille_li, b.specificat, b.specific_1, b.type_cab_1, b.code_pf_a, b.code_pf_b, b.change_sit, b.cable_abse, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_piq, ''::text) AS num_equipe_piq, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_aig, ''::text) AS num_equipe_aig, string_agg(DISTINCT c.num_equipe_gc, ''::text) AS num_equipe_gc FROM ((athd.t_cb a JOIN athd.t_cb_georeso b ON ((a.cb_id = b.cb_id))) JOIN athd.t_cm c ON ((c.cm_id = ANY (a.cm_id)))) GROUP BY b.cb_id, b.geom, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.type_site_, b.code_site_, b.type_sit_1, b.code_sit_1, b.code_proje, b.commentair, b.type_longu, b.diametre, b.nb_fibre, b.operateur, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.id_refsi, b.usage_ftth, b.usage_rome, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.longueur, b.type_cable, b.type_lon_1, b.id_ftth, b.reseau, b.famille, b.famille_li, b.specificat, b.specific_1, b.type_cab_1, b.code_pf_a, b.code_pf_b, b.change_sit, b.cable_abse;

table.name: cb_travaux
table.remarks: Câbles optiques à traiter en travaux
table.viewSql: SELECT d.cb_id, array_agg(DISTINCT c.cm_id) AS cm_id, CASE WHEN (st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c.geom))) = 1) THEN st_linemerge(st_union(c.geom)) ELSE NULL::geometry END AS geom, CASE WHEN (st_numgeometries(st_linemerge(st_union(c.geom))) = 1) THEN NULL::text ELSE 'INVALIDE'::text END AS erreur, b.avancement, b.pose_date_prev, b.pose_equipe, b.pose_date, b.numero_touret, b.ml_section_sout, b.ml_section_aer, b.ml_section_fac, b.ml_section_port, b.commentaire FROM (((((athd.t_cb a JOIN athd.t_cb_etude d ON ((a.cb_id = d.cb_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_cb_travaux b ON ((a.cb_id = b.cb_id))) JOIN athd.t_cm c ON ((c.cm_id = ANY (a.cm_id)))) JOIN athd.t_zpm e ON (st_intersects(c.geom, e.geom))) JOIN athd.t_zpm_suivi f ON ((e.zpm_id = f.zpm_id))) WHERE (f.etude_exe_date_validation_ran IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY d.cb_id, b.avancement, b.pose_date_prev, b.pose_equipe, b.pose_date, b.numero_touret, b.ml_section_sout, b.ml_section_aer, b.ml_section_fac, b.ml_section_port, b.commentaire;

table.name: cm_aiguillage
table.remarks: Tronçons à traiter en aiguillage
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, a.geom, b.nom, b.proprietaire, b.a_nom, b.a_code_interne, b.a_aerien_num, b.b_nom, b.b_code_interne, b.b_aerien_num, b.longueur, b.angle, b.cables_nappe_basse_coax, b.cables_nappe_standard_cu, b.cables_nappe_haute_fo, b.nappe_bt1, b.nappe_bt2, b.nappe_bt3, b.a_masque, b.a_alv_num, b.a_alv_ligne, b.a_alv_col, b.b_masque, b.b_alv_num, b.b_alv_ligne, b.b_alv_col, b.etat, b.diametre_fourreau, b.aiguillage, b.cables_diametres, b.cables_types, b.occupation, b.occupation_progetee, b.reservation, b.avancement, b.commentaire FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_aiguillage b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: cm_athd
table.remarks: Tronçons ATHD existants
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, b.geom, b.gid, b.ar_guid, b.ar_pose, b.amont_nd, b.aval_nd, b.nbfour_ar, b.nbfourpp, b.diam_four, b.type_four, b.dispo_ar, b.dispopp_ar, b.propr_four, b.mes_ar, b.georef_ar, b.comment_ar FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_athd b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: cm_bt
table.remarks: Tronçons Enedis existants
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, b.geom, b.type_de_li, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_bt b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: cm_ca_auto
table.remarks: Détermine le reste à faire en C3A
table.viewSql: WITH cm_etude_orange AS ( SELECT a_1.cm_id, a_1.geom FROM (((athd.t_cm a_1 JOIN athd.t_pt b_1 ON (st_intersects(a_1.geom, st_buffer(b_1.geom, (0.001)::double precision)))) JOIN athd.t_cm_etude c_1 ON ((a_1.cm_id = c_1.cm_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt_etude d_1 ON ((b_1.pt_id = d_1.pt_id))) WHERE (b_1.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) ) SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY unnested_cm_id.unnested_cm_id, a.cb_id) AS id, unnested_cm_id.unnested_cm_id AS cm_id, a.cb_id, e.fci, CASE WHEN ((amont.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (amont.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'C'::text WHEN ((amont.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (amont.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) THEN 'A'::text WHEN ((amont.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text) AND (amont.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'CT'::text WHEN ((amont.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text) AND (amont.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) THEN 'AT'::text WHEN (amont.structure = ANY (ARRAY['IMMEUBLE'::text, '%COLONNE%'::text])) THEN 'IMB'::text WHEN ((amont.structure ~~ '%FACADE%'::text) OR (amont.structure ~~ '%AUTRE%'::text)) THEN 'F'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS type_a, CASE WHEN ((amont.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (amont.structure = ANY (ARRAY['CHAMBRE'::text, 'APPUI'::text]))) THEN ((amont.insee || '/'::text) || amont.nom) ELSE NULL::text END AS numero_a, amont.pt_id AS pt_id_a, CASE WHEN ((aval.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (aval.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'C'::text WHEN ((aval.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (aval.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) THEN 'A'::text WHEN ((aval.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text) AND (aval.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'CT'::text WHEN ((aval.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text) AND (aval.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) THEN 'AT'::text WHEN (aval.structure = ANY (ARRAY['IMMEUBLE'::text, '%COLONNE%'::text])) THEN 'IMB'::text WHEN ((aval.structure ~~ '%FACADE%'::text) OR (aval.structure ~~ '%AUTRE%'::text)) THEN 'F'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS type_b, CASE WHEN ((aval.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (aval.structure = ANY (ARRAY['CHAMBRE'::text, 'APPUI'::text]))) THEN ((aval.insee || '/'::text) || aval.nom) ELSE NULL::text END AS numero_b, aval.pt_id AS pt_id_b, (st_length(c.geom))::integer AS longueur, b.cb_code AS commentaire, CASE WHEN ((amont.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) AND (aval.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN '45'::text WHEN ((aval.structure = ANY (ARRAY['IMMEUBLE'::text, '%COLONNE%'::text])) OR (amont.structure = ANY (ARRAY['IMMEUBLE'::text, '%COLONNE%'::text]))) THEN 'adduction'::text WHEN ((amont.structure = 'APPUI'::text) AND (aval.structure <> 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'aérien'::text WHEN ((aval.structure = 'APPUI'::text) AND (amont.structure <> 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'aérien'::text WHEN ((aval.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) AND (amont.structure <> 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'transition'::text WHEN ((amont.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) AND (aval.structure <> 'CHAMBRE'::text)) THEN 'transition'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS diametre_alveole, CASE WHEN (e.ca_id IS NOT NULL) THEN true ELSE false END AS correspondance_ca, c.geom, st_astext(amont.geom) AS a_geom, st_astext(aval.geom) AS b_geom FROM (((((((athd.t_cb a CROSS JOIN LATERAL unnest(a.cm_id) unnested_cm_id(unnested_cm_id)) JOIN athd.t_cb_etude b ON ((a.cb_id = b.cb_id))) JOIN cm_etude_orange c ON ((c.cm_id = unnested_cm_id.unnested_cm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt d ON (st_touches(d.geom, c.geom))) LEFT JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT pt.pt_id, pt.nom, pt.structure, pt.gestionnaire, pt.geom, pt.insee FROM athd.t_pt pt WHERE st_dwithin(st_startpoint(c.geom), pt.geom, (0.001)::double precision) ORDER BY (st_distance(st_startpoint(c.geom), pt.geom)) LIMIT 1) amont ON (true)) LEFT JOIN LATERAL ( SELECT pt.pt_id, pt.nom, pt.structure, pt.gestionnaire, pt.geom, pt.insee FROM athd.t_pt pt WHERE st_dwithin(st_endpoint(c.geom), pt.geom, (0.001)::double precision) ORDER BY (st_distance(st_endpoint(c.geom), pt.geom)) LIMIT 1) aval ON (true)) LEFT JOIN athd.ca e ON (((e.pt_id_a = amont.pt_id) AND (e.pt_id_b = aval.pt_id) AND (b.cb_code = e.commentaire)))) WHERE ((b.cb_code IS NOT NULL) AND (NOT (((amont.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (amont.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) AND (aval.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text) AND (aval.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) OR ((aval.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (aval.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) AND (amont.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text) AND (amont.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text))))) GROUP BY unnested_cm_id.unnested_cm_id, a.cb_id, b.cb_code, c.geom, amont.insee, aval.insee, amont.pt_id, amont.nom, amont.structure, amont.gestionnaire, aval.pt_id, aval.nom, aval.structure, aval.gestionnaire, e.ca_id, amont.geom, aval.geom;

table.name: cm_client
table.remarks: Tronçons provenants du client / données avant vente
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, b.geom, b.id_infra, b.id_nro, b.id_sro, b.mode_pose, b.nature, b.comp_cable, b.longueur, b.reseau, b.cables, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_client b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: cm_etude
table.remarks: Tronçons projetés en étude (doit être remplassé par cm_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, a.geom, b.gid, b.cm_code, b.cm_codeext, b.cm_tr, b.cm_d1, b.cm_d2, b.cm_support, b.cm_compo, b.cm_cb_tr, b.cm_cb_d1, b.cm_cb_d2, b.cm_long, b.cm_comment, b.cm_creadat, b.cm_majdat, b.annee, b.secteur, b.zanro, b.zapm, b.zapa, b.etr, b.rad, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_etude b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: cm_etude_auto
table.remarks: Tronçons projetés en étude
table.viewSql: WITH capa_cable_par_cm AS ( SELECT grouped_data.cm_id, string_agg(grouped_data.cable, '+'::text) AS cables, grouped_data.categorie FROM ( SELECT subquery.cm_id, (((count(*) || 'x'::text) || subquery.cb_capafo) || 'FO'::text) AS cable, subquery.cb_fonc AS categorie FROM ( SELECT a_1.cb_id, unnest(a_1.cm_id) AS cm_id, b_1.cb_capafo, b_1.cb_fonc FROM (athd.t_cb a_1 JOIN athd.t_cb_etude b_1 ON ((a_1.cb_id = b_1.cb_id)))) subquery WHERE (subquery.cb_fonc IS NOT NULL) GROUP BY subquery.cm_id, subquery.cb_capafo, subquery.cb_fonc) grouped_data GROUP BY grouped_data.cm_id, grouped_data.categorie ) SELECT DISTINCT b.cm_id, a.geom, b.gid, b.cm_code, NULL::text AS cm_codeext, b.cm_tr, b.cm_d1, b.cm_d2, CASE WHEN (((c.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) OR (d.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) AND (f.cm_id IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'SOUTERRAIN_A_CREER'::text WHEN (((c.structure = 'APPUI'::text) OR (d.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) AND (f.cm_id IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'AERIEN_A_CREER'::text WHEN ((c.structure = 'IMMEUBLE'::text) OR (d.structure = 'IMMEUBLE'::text)) THEN 'IMMEUBLE'::text WHEN ((c.structure = 'FACADE'::text) OR (d.structure = 'FACADE'::text)) THEN 'FACADE'::text WHEN (((c.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) OR (d.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire = 'ATHD'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire = 'ATHD'::text))) THEN 'CONDUITE_ATHD'::text WHEN (((c.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) OR (d.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text))) THEN 'CONDUITE_ORANGE'::text WHEN (((c.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) OR (d.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire <> 'ATHD'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire <> 'ATHD'::text))) THEN 'CONDUITE_TIERS'::text WHEN (((c.structure = 'APPUI'::text) OR (d.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire = 'ATHD'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire = 'ATHD'::text))) THEN 'AERIEN_ATHD'::text WHEN (((c.structure = 'APPUI'::text) OR (d.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text))) THEN 'AERIEN_ORANGE'::text WHEN (((c.structure = 'APPUI'::text) OR (d.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire = 'ENEDIS'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire = 'ENEDIS'::text))) THEN 'AERIEN_ENEDIS'::text WHEN (((c.structure = 'APPUI'::text) OR (d.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire <> 'ORANGE'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire <> 'ATHD'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire <> 'ATHD'::text)) AND ((c.gestionnaire <> 'ENEDIS'::text) OR (d.gestionnaire <> 'ENEDIS'::text))) THEN 'AERIEN_TIERS'::text ELSE NULL::text END AS cm_support, f.cm_compo, ( SELECT capa_cable_par_cm.cables FROM capa_cable_par_cm WHERE ((capa_cable_par_cm.categorie = 'TR'::text) AND (capa_cable_par_cm.cm_id = a.cm_id))) AS cm_cb_tr, ( SELECT capa_cable_par_cm.cables FROM capa_cable_par_cm WHERE ((capa_cable_par_cm.categorie = 'D1'::text) AND (capa_cable_par_cm.cm_id = a.cm_id))) AS cm_cb_d1, ( SELECT capa_cable_par_cm.cables FROM capa_cable_par_cm WHERE ((capa_cable_par_cm.categorie = 'D2'::text) AND (capa_cable_par_cm.cm_id = a.cm_id))) AS cm_cb_d2, (st_length(a.geom))::integer AS cm_long, b.cm_comment, b.cm_creadat, b.cm_majdat, NULL::text AS annee, h.type AS secteur, k.za_code AS zanro, CASE WHEN ((b.cm_d1 = 'D1'::text) OR (b.cm_d2 = 'D2'::text)) THEN i.za_code ELSE NULL::text END AS zapm, CASE WHEN (b.cm_d2 = 'D2'::text) THEN m.za_code ELSE NULL::text END AS zapa, NULL::text AS etr, NULL::text AS rad FROM (((((((((((athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_etude b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt c ON (st_dwithin(st_startpoint(a.geom), c.geom, (0.2)::double precision))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt d ON (st_dwithin(st_endpoint(a.geom), d.geom, (0.2)::double precision))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt_etude e ON (((e.pt_id = c.pt_id) OR (e.pt_id = d.pt_id)))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_cm_projection_gc f ON ((b.cm_id = f.cm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm h ON (st_intersects(a.geom, h.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude i ON ((h.zpm_id = i.zpm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro j ON (st_intersects(a.geom, j.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro_etude k ON ((j.znro_id = k.znro_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpa l ON (st_intersects(a.geom, l.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpa_etude m ON ((l.zpa_id = m.zpa_id)));

table.name: cm_etude_erreur_geom
table.remarks: Permet de visualiser les tronçons avec erreur de géométrie (Accrochage pm, pt, etc)
table.viewSql: SELECT a.cm_id, a.geom, CASE WHEN (a.cm_id IN ( SELECT t_cm_piquetage.cm_id FROM athd.t_cm_piquetage)) THEN true ELSE false END AS presence_piquetage, CASE WHEN (a.cm_id IN ( SELECT t_cm_aiguillage.cm_id FROM athd.t_cm_aiguillage)) THEN true ELSE false END AS presence_aiguillage FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_etude b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id))) WHERE (( SELECT count(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT pt.pt_id FROM (athd.t_pt_etude f JOIN athd.t_pt pt ON ((f.pt_id = pt.pt_id))) WHERE st_touches(a.geom, pt.geom) UNION ALL SELECT lgmt.lgmt_id FROM (athd.t_lgmt_etude g JOIN athd.t_lgmt lgmt ON ((g.lgmt_id = lgmt.lgmt_id))) WHERE st_touches(a.geom, lgmt.geom) UNION ALL SELECT pm.pm_id FROM (athd.t_pm_etude h JOIN athd.t_pm pm ON ((h.pm_id = pm.pm_id))) WHERE st_touches(a.geom, pm.geom) UNION ALL SELECT nro.nro_id FROM (athd.t_nro_etude i JOIN athd.t_nro nro ON ((i.nro_id = nro.nro_id))) WHERE st_touches(a.geom, nro.geom)) subquery) < 2);

table.name: cm_fiabilisation_exi
table.remarks: Tronçons existants à fiabiliser sur le terrain
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, a.geom, b.avancement, b.mode_pose, b.gestionnaire, b.longueur, b.commentaire FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_fiabilisation_exi b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: cm_piquetage
table.remarks: Tronçons à traiter en piquetage
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, a.geom, b.nom, b.proprietaire, b.a_nom, b.a_code_interne, b.a_aerien_num, b.b_nom, b.b_code_interne, b.b_aerien_num, b.longueur, b.angle, b.cables_nappe_basse_coax, b.cables_nappe_standard_cu, b.cables_nappe_haute_fo, b.nappe_bt1, b.nappe_bt2, b.nappe_bt3, b.a_masque, b.a_alv_num, b.a_alv_ligne, b.a_alv_col, b.b_masque, b.b_alv_num, b.b_alv_ligne, b.b_alv_col, b.etat, b.diametre_fourreau, b.aiguillage, b.cables_diametres, b.cables_types, b.occupation, b.occupation_progetee, b.reservation, b.avancement, b.ignorer_terrain FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_piquetage b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: cm_pit
table.remarks: Tronçons présents dans le PIT ORANGE
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, b.geom, b.statut, b.mode_pose, b.aut_passag, b.nature_con, b.type_longu, b.longueur, b.compositio, b.id_proprie, b.origine, b.shape_len, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_pit b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: cm_projection_gc
table.remarks: Tronçons projetés en création
table.viewSql: SELECT b.cm_id, a.geom, b.cm_compo, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_cm a JOIN athd.t_cm_projection_gc b ON ((a.cm_id = b.cm_id)));

table.name: comac
table.remarks: Ensemble des appuis issuent de la production Comac

table.name: commentaire_piquetage
table.remarks: Zones commentaires définies par les piqueteurs

table.name: commune
table.remarks: Communes du département

table.name: creation_rbal_piquetage
table.remarks: Table permettant le suivi visuel des créations RBAL. Cette table n'a aucune valeur en terme de données.

table.name: elagage
table.remarks: Elagages par parcelle
table.viewSql: SELECT a.elag_id, a.parc_id, c.nro, c.nom AS zpm, a.elag_geom, st_astext(b.geom) AS parc_geom, CASE WHEN (b.parc_commune IS NOT NULL) THEN b.parc_commune ELSE a.parc_commune END AS parc_commune, CASE WHEN (b.parc_cp IS NOT NULL) THEN b.parc_cp ELSE a.parc_cp END AS parc_cp, CASE WHEN (b.parc_adresse IS NOT NULL) THEN b.parc_adresse ELSE a.parc_adresse END AS parc_adresse, CASE WHEN (b.gest_raison IS NOT NULL) THEN b.gest_raison ELSE a.gest_raison END AS gest_raison, CASE WHEN (b.gest_contact IS NOT NULL) THEN b.gest_contact ELSE a.gest_contact END AS gest_contact, CASE WHEN (b.gest_fonction IS NOT NULL) THEN b.gest_fonction ELSE a.gest_fonction END AS gest_fonction, CASE WHEN (b.gest_telephone IS NOT NULL) THEN b.gest_telephone ELSE a.gest_telephone END AS gest_telephone, CASE WHEN (b.gest_mail IS NOT NULL) THEN b.gest_mail ELSE a.gest_mail END AS gest_mail, CASE WHEN (b.gest_commune IS NOT NULL) THEN b.gest_commune ELSE a.gest_commune END AS gest_commune, CASE WHEN (b.gest_cp IS NOT NULL) THEN b.gest_cp ELSE a.gest_cp END AS gest_cp, CASE WHEN (b.gest_adresse IS NOT NULL) THEN b.gest_adresse ELSE a.gest_adresse END AS gest_adresse, a.date, a.longueur, a.domanialite, a.nb_prise, a.date_envoi, a.date_retour, a.date_prev_elagage, a.date_controle, a.avancement FROM (((athd.t_elagage a LEFT JOIN athd.parcelle b ON ((a.parc_id = (b.id)::text))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm c ON (st_intersects(a.elag_geom, c.geom))) JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude d ON ((c.zpm_id = d.zpm_id)));

table.name: hub_etude
table.remarks: Adductions projetés en étude (doit être remplassé par hub_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: SELECT b.hub_id, a.bo_id, a.lgmt_id, b.ad_code, b.pt_code, b.ad_distinf, st_makeline(d.geom, e.geom) AS geom FROM ((((athd.t_hub a JOIN athd.t_hub_etude b ON ((a.hub_id = b.hub_id))) JOIN athd.t_bo c ON ((c.bo_id = a.bo_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt d ON ((d.pt_id = c.pt_id))) JOIN athd.t_lgmt e ON ((e.lgmt_id = a.lgmt_id))) GROUP BY b.hub_id, a.bo_id, a.lgmt_id, b.ad_code, b.pt_code, b.ad_distinf, d.geom, e.geom;

table.name: hub_etude_auto
table.remarks: Adductions projetés en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.hub_id, a.bo_id, a.lgmt_id, h.ad_code, g.pt_code, (st_length(st_makeline(d.geom, e.geom)))::integer AS ad_distinf, st_makeline(d.geom, e.geom) AS geom FROM (((((((athd.t_hub a JOIN athd.t_hub_etude b ON ((a.hub_id = b.hub_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_bo c ON ((c.bo_id = a.bo_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_bo_etude g ON ((c.bo_id = g.bo_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt d ON ((d.pt_id = c.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_lgmt e ON ((e.lgmt_id = a.lgmt_id))) JOIN athd.t_lgmt_etude f ON ((e.lgmt_id = f.lgmt_id))) JOIN athd.t_lgmt_piquetage h ON ((f.lgmt_id = h.lgmt_id))) GROUP BY b.hub_id, a.bo_id, a.lgmt_id, h.ad_code, g.pt_code, b.ad_distinf, d.geom, e.geom;

table.name: logement_etude

table.name: logement_georeso
table.remarks: Logements présents dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.lgmt_id, b.geom, a.source, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.type_voie, b.num_voie, b.lib_num_cp, b.nom_voie, b.nom_com, b.code_insee, b.code_voie, b.nb_logemen, b.commentair, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.batiment, b.escalier, b.dcomiris, b.densite, b.tag_optimu, b.operateur, b.syndic, b.nb_el_synd, b.etat, b.symbologie, b.exclu, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.deployeur, b.reseau, b.id_ftth, b.id_potenti, b.origine, b.potentiel, b.deplacemen, b.nom_affich, b.adresse, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_lgmt a JOIN athd.t_lgmt_georeso b ON ((a.lgmt_id = b.lgmt_id)));

table.name: logement_piquetage
table.remarks: Logements à traiter en relevé
table.viewSql: SELECT b.lgmt_id, a.geom, a.source, b.etat, b.ad_code, b.ad_nomvoie, b.ad_numero, b.ad_rep, b.ad_insee, b.ad_commune, b.ad_ban_id, b.ad_idpar, b.ad_rivoli, b.ad_hexacle, b.ad_fantoir, b.ad_x_l93, b.ad_y_l93, b.nombre_el, b.ad_nbprhab, b.ad_nbprpro, b.ad_nbeltot, b.ad_racc, b.ad_prio, b.ad_imb, b.ad_isole, b.ad_comment, b.ad_creadat, b.ad_majdat, b.annee, b.secteur, b.zanro, b.zapm, b.zapa, b.zapb, b.ad_distinf, b.ad_ln_tr, b.ad_ln_d1, b.ad_ln_d2, b.etr, b.long_tot, b.commentair, b.dpt, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc, CASE WHEN (c.lgmt_id IS NOT NULL) THEN true ELSE false END AS presence_georeso, b.ref_imb, d.etat_ipe FROM (((athd.t_lgmt a JOIN athd.t_lgmt_piquetage b ON ((a.lgmt_id = b.lgmt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_lgmt_georeso c ON ((a.lgmt_id = c.lgmt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_lgmt_etat_ipe d ON ((b.ref_imb = (d.ref_imb)::text)));

table.viewSql: SELECT b.lgmt_id, b.geom, a.source, b.fid_1, b.nbel, b.insee, b.nom, b.phase, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_lgmt a JOIN athd.t_lgmt_rad b ON ((a.lgmt_id = b.lgmt_id)));

table.name: nro_etude
table.remarks: NRO utilisés en étude (doit être remplassé par nro_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: SELECT b.nro_id, a.geom, b.pt_id, b.pt_sptyp, b.pt_spcode, b.pt_code, b.pt_type, b.pt_nbel, b.pt_com, b.pt_comment, b.pt_creadat, b.pt_majdat, b.secteur, b.etr, b.lots FROM (athd.t_nro a JOIN athd.t_nro_etude b ON ((a.nro_id = b.nro_id)));

table.name: nro_etude_auto
table.remarks: NRO utilisés en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.nro_id, a.geom, b.pt_code AS pt_id, b.pt_sptyp, b.pt_spcode, b.pt_code, 'NRO'::text AS pt_type, b.pt_nbel, c.id AS pt_com, b.pt_comment, b.pt_creadat, b.pt_majdat, NULL::text AS secteur, NULL::text AS etr, NULL::text AS lots FROM ((athd.t_nro a JOIN athd.t_nro_etude b ON ((a.nro_id = b.nro_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.commune c ON (st_intersects(a.geom, c.geom)));

table.name: pm_client

table.viewSql: SELECT t_pm_client.pm_id, t_pm_client.geom, t_pm_client.id_sro, t_pm_client.id_nro, t_pm_client.nb_prise, t_pm_client.l_nro_sro, t_pm_client.sropto_min, t_pm_client.sropto_avg, t_pm_client.sropto_max, t_pm_client.s_id_metie, t_pm_client.etat, t_pm_client.zone, t_pm_client.s_id_sro, t_pm_client.id_sro2 FROM athd.t_pm_client;

table.name: pm_etude
table.remarks: PM utilisés en étude (doit être remplassé par pm_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pm_id, a.geom, b.pt_id, b.pt_sptyp, b.pt_spcode, b.pt_code, b.pt_type, b.pt_nbel, b.pt_ptam, b.pt_com, b.pt_comment, b.pt_creadat, b.pt_majdat, b.annee, b.zanro, b.secteur, b.cbl_ent, b.pt_ln_tr, b.etr FROM (athd.t_pm a JOIN athd.t_pm_etude b ON ((a.pm_id = b.pm_id)));

table.name: pm_etude_auto
table.remarks: PM utilisés en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pm_id, a.geom, b.pt_code AS pt_id, NULL::text AS pt_sptyp, NULL::text AS pt_spcode, b.pt_code, 'PM'::text AS pt_type, b.pt_nbel, d.za_code AS pt_ptam, e.id AS pt_com, b.pt_comment, b.pt_creadat, b.pt_majdat, NULL::text AS annee, d.za_code AS zanro, g.type AS secteur, b.cbl_ent, b.pt_ln_tr, NULL::text AS etr FROM ((((((athd.t_pm a JOIN athd.t_pm_etude b ON ((a.pm_id = b.pm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro c ON (st_intersects(a.geom, c.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro_etude d ON ((d.znro_id = c.znro_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.commune e ON (st_intersects(a.geom, e.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude f ON ((f.za_code = b.pt_code))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm g ON ((f.zpm_id = g.zpm_id)));

table.name: pm_fiabilisation_exi
table.remarks: PM existants à fiabiliser sur le terrain
table.viewSql: SELECT a.pm_id, a.geom, b.avancement, d.pt_code, b.commentaire FROM ((athd.t_pm a JOIN athd.t_pm_fiabilisation_exi b ON ((a.pm_id = b.pm_id))) JOIN athd.t_pm_etude d ON ((a.pm_id = d.pm_id)));

table.name: pm_georeso
table.remarks: PM présents dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pm_id, b.geom, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.type_site, b.code_site, b.siteid, b.type_pf, b.operateur, b.commentair, b.nom_nro, b.type_pf_pe, b.code_pf_pe, b.projet_cod, b.type_peo, b.nb_sortie_, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.date_pmpa, b.nb_coupleu, b.nb_coupl_1, b.id_refsi, b.id_regleme, b.code_sd, b.vers_ingen, b.rome_ok, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.id_ftth, b.reseau, b.id_ftth_pf, b.id_refsi_p, b.id_refsi_1, b.date_publi, b.demande_id FROM (athd.t_pm a JOIN athd.t_pm_georeso b ON ((a.pm_id = b.pm_id)));

table.name: pt_aiguillage
table.remarks: Points techniques à traiter en aiguillage
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pt_id, a.geom, a.insee, a.nom, a.structure, a.gestionnaire, a.modele, b.type, b.modele_classe, b.hauteur, b.implantation, b.num_voie, b.compl_num_voie, b.type_voie, b.voie, b.ville, b.a_creer, b.etat, b.liaison_souterraine, b.rehausse, b.annee, b.gravure_illisible, b.propriete_privee, b.surplomb, b.elagage, b.inaccessible_vehicule, b.voisinage_erdf, b.flambement_ok, b.verticalite_ok, b.etiquette_jaune, b.tete_appui_utilisable, b.visuel_ok, b.percussion_ok, b.secousses_ok, b.pointe_carree_ok, b.tete_poteau_ok, b.remplacement_poteau, b.modele_remplacement, b.renforcement_poteau, b.recalage_appui, b.milieu_environnant, b.appui_strategique, b.bandeau_vert, b.liaison_souterraine_bt, b.liaison_souterraine_terre, b.creation_transition_aero_souterraine, b.eclairage_public, b.hauteur_eclairage_public, b.surimplantation, b.cable_branchement_cuivre, b.cable_branchement_coax, b.cable_branchement_fibre, b.nb_boitier_electrique, b.nb_boitier_cuivre, b.nb_boitier_coax, b.pose_boitier_fibre, b.installation_dispositif_lovage, b.respect_regle_1face_2angles, b.forcer_cable_branchement_enedis, b.nappe_bt_1_hauteur, b.nappe_bt_2_hauteur, b.nappe_bt_3_hauteur, b.traverse_fibre_hauteur, b.traverse_cuivre_hauteur, b.traverse_coax_hauteur, b.commentaires, b.equipements_nombre, b.equipements_noms, b.equipements_types, b.equipements_operateurs, b.photo_ensemble, b.photo_portee, b.photo_vue_tete, b.photo_etiquette, b.photo_complementaire_1, b.photo_complementaire_2, b.photo_complementaire_3, b.photo_complementaire_4, b.photo_complementaire_5, b.photo_complementaire_6, b.photo_complementaire_7, b.photo_complementaire_8, b.photo_complementaire_9, b.angle_orientation, b.latitude, b.longitude, b.qgis_angle, b.photo_dessus, b.photo_implantation, b.photo_masque_a, b.photo_masque_b, b.photo_masque_c, b.photo_masque_d, b.photo_masque_e, b.photo_masque_f, b.photo_masque_g, b.photo_masque_h, b.photo_masque_i, b.photo_masque_j, b.photo_masque_k, b.photo_masque_l, b.photo_masque_m, b.avancement, b.commentaire FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_aiguillage b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

table.name: pt_capft_auto
table.remarks: Détermine le reste à faire en C6
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT a.pt_id, a.geom, a.nom, CASE WHEN (c.pt_id IS NOT NULL) THEN true ELSE false END AS correspondance_capft, c.fci, c.nature_travaux, h.photo_ensemble, h.photo_portee, h.photo_vue_tete, h.photo_etiquette, h.photo_complementaire_1, h.photo_complementaire_2, h.photo_complementaire_3, h.photo_complementaire_4, h.photo_complementaire_5, h.photo_complementaire_6, h.photo_complementaire_7, h.photo_complementaire_8, h.photo_complementaire_9 FROM (((athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_etude b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id))) JOIN athd.t_pt_piquetage h ON ((b.pt_id = h.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.capft c ON ((b.pt_id = c.pt_id))) WHERE ((a.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (a.structure = 'APPUI'::text));

table.name: pt_capft_travaux
table.remarks: Appuis calculés via Capft nécessitants des travaux
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT a.pt_id, a.geom, a.insee, a.nom, c.zpm, a.domanialite, c.fci, c.nature_travaux, c.type_apres, h.date_prev_retrait, h.date_retrait, h.date_prev_travaux, h.date_travaux, h.commentaire FROM (((athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_etude b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.capft c ON ((b.pt_id = c.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt_capft_travaux h ON ((a.pt_id = h.pt_id))) WHERE ((a.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) AND (a.structure = 'APPUI'::text) AND (c.nature_travaux = ANY (ARRAY['Remplacement'::text, 'Renforcement'::text, 'Recalage'::text])));

table.name: pt_client
table.remarks: Points techniques provenants du client / données avant vente
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pt_id, a.structure, a.insee, a.nom, a.modele, a.gestionnaire, b.geom, b.id_ptech, b.id_nro, b.id_sro, b.reseau, b.type, b.mode_pose, b.nature, b.statut, b.nb_bpe, b.etiquette, b.implant, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_client b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

table.name: pt_comac_auto
table.remarks: Détermine le reste à faire en Comac
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT a.pt_id, a.geom, i.nom AS zpm, c.numero, a.gestionnaire, c.artere, c.taux_utilisation, CASE WHEN (c.pt_id IS NOT NULL) THEN true ELSE false END AS correspondance_comac, h.photo_ensemble, h.photo_portee, h.photo_vue_tete, h.photo_etiquette, h.photo_complementaire_1, h.photo_complementaire_2, h.photo_complementaire_3, h.photo_complementaire_4, h.photo_complementaire_5, h.photo_complementaire_6, h.photo_complementaire_7, h.photo_complementaire_8, h.photo_complementaire_9 FROM ((((athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_etude b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt_piquetage h ON ((h.pt_id = b.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.comac c ON ((b.pt_id = c.pt_id))) JOIN athd.t_zpm i ON (st_intersects(i.geom, a.geom))) WHERE (((a.gestionnaire = 'ENEDIS'::text) OR (a.gestionnaire = 'AODE'::text)) AND (a.structure = 'APPUI'::text));

table.name: pt_comac_travaux
table.remarks: Appuis calculés via Comac nécessitants un doublement
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT a.pt_id, a.geom, a.insee, a.nom, a.gestionnaire, a.domanialite, c.zpm, c.artere, c.taux_utilisation, h.pt_id_doublement, i.nom AS nom_doublement, i.modele AS modele_doublement, st_astext(i.geom) AS geom_doublement, h.date_prev_retrait, h.date_retrait, h.date_prev_travaux, h.date_travaux, h.commentaire FROM ((((athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_etude b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.comac c ON ((b.pt_id = c.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt_comac_travaux h ON ((a.pt_id = h.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt i ON ((i.pt_id = h.pt_id_doublement))) WHERE (((a.gestionnaire = 'ENEDIS'::text) AND (a.structure = 'APPUI'::text) AND (c.taux_utilisation > (100)::numeric) AND (c.taux_utilisation IS NOT NULL)) OR ((a.structure = 'APPUI'::text) AND (b.pt_prop = 'RAUV'::text) AND (b.pt_gest = 'ATHD'::text) AND (b.pt_avct = 'C'::text) AND (b.pt_comment ~~ '%IMPLANTATION COMAC SUPPLEMENTAIRE%'::text)));

table.name: pt_etude
table.remarks: Points techniques projetés en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pt_id, a.geom, a.insee, a.nom, a.structure, a.gestionnaire, a.modele, b.pt_codeext, b.pt_prop, b.pt_gest, b.pt_proptyp, b.pt_statut, b.pt_avct, b.pt_typephy, b.pt_nature, b.pt_a_struc, b.pt_a_hauteur, b.pt_owf, b.pt_travaux, b.pt_eplan, b.pt_fonc, b.pt_comment, b.pt_zapa FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_etude b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

table.name: pt_fiabilisation_exi
table.remarks: Points techniques existants à fiabiliser sur le terrain
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pt_id, a.geom, a.insee, a.nom, a.structure, a.gestionnaire, a.modele, b.commentaire FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_fiabilisation_exi b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

table.name: pt_georeso
table.remarks: Points techniques présents dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pt_id, a.insee, a.nom, a.structure, a.gestionnaire, a.modele, b.geom, b.gid, b.site_type_, b.code, b.libelle, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.site_typ_1, b.id_proprie, b.proprietai, b.id_gestion, b.gestionnai, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.commentair, b.rotation, b.hauteur, b.auteur, b.date_modif, b.date_creat, b.id_ftth, b.deployeur, b.modif_geo, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.adresse, b.code_ch1_c, b.code_ch2_p, b.reseau, b.app_nature, b.app_type_l, b.abs_pit, b.implantati, b.largeur, b.longueur, b.capa_heber, b.type_arm, b.id_refsi_l, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_georeso b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

table.name: pt_gespot
table.remarks: Points techniques présents dans Gespot
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pt_id, a.structure, a.insee, a.nom, a.modele, a.gestionnaire, b.geom, b.dept, b.num_appui, b.code_commune, b.libelle_commune, b.code_voie, b.libelle_voie, b.code_centre, b.code_zone, b.code_entite, b.num_voie, b.type_appui, b.caract1, b.caract2, b.caract3, b.caract4, b.caract5, b.type_projection, b.coord_x, b.coord_y, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_gespot b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

b.ville, b.a_creer, b.etat, b.liaison_souterraine, b.rehausse, b.annee, b.gravure_illisible, b.propriete_privee, b.surplomb, b.elagage, b.inaccessible_vehicule, b.voisinage_erdf, b.flambement_ok, b.verticalite_ok, b.etiquette_jaune, b.tete_appui_utilisable, b.visuel_ok, b.percussion_ok, b.secousses_ok, b.pointe_carree_ok, b.tete_poteau_ok, b.remplacement_poteau, b.modele_remplacement, b.renforcement_poteau, b.recalage_appui, b.milieu_environnant, b.appui_strategique, b.bandeau_vert, b.liaison_souterraine_bt, b.liaison_souterraine_terre, b.creation_transition_aero_souterraine, b.eclairage_public, b.hauteur_eclairage_public, b.surimplantation, b.cable_branchement_cuivre, b.cable_branchement_coax, b.cable_branchement_fibre, b.nb_boitier_electrique, b.nb_boitier_cuivre, b.nb_boitier_coax, b.pose_boitier_fibre, b.installation_dispositif_lovage, b.respect_regle_1face_2angles, b.forcer_cable_branchement_enedis, b.nappe_bt_1_hauteur, b.nappe_bt_2_hauteur, b.nappe_bt_3_hauteur, b.traverse_fibre_hauteur, b.traverse_cuivre_hauteur, b.traverse_coax_hauteur, b.commentaires, b.equipements_nombre, b.equipements_noms, b.equipements_types, b.equipements_operateurs, b.photo_ensemble, b.photo_portee, b.photo_vue_tete, b.photo_etiquette, b.photo_complementaire_1, b.photo_complementaire_2, b.photo_complementaire_3, b.photo_complementaire_4, b.photo_complementaire_5, b.photo_complementaire_6, b.photo_complementaire_7, b.photo_complementaire_8, b.photo_complementaire_9, b.angle_orientation, b.latitude, b.longitude, b.qgis_angle, b.photo_dessus, b.photo_implantation, b.photo_masque_a, b.photo_masque_b, b.photo_masque_c, b.photo_masque_d, b.photo_masque_e, b.photo_masque_f, b.photo_masque_g, b.photo_masque_h, b.photo_masque_i, b.photo_masque_j, b.photo_masque_k, b.photo_masque_l, b.photo_masque_m, b.avancement, b.ignorer_terrain FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_piquetage b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

table.name: pt_pit
table.remarks: Points techniques présents dans le PIT Orange
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pt_id, a.structure, a.insee, a.nom, a.modele, a.gestionnaire, b.geom, b.statut, b.nature, b.type, b.hauteur, b.rotation, b.implant, b.nature_cha, b.ref_chambr, b.id_proprie, b.code_ch1, b.code_ch2, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_pit b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

table.name: pt_projection_gc
table.remarks: Points techniques projetés en création
table.viewSql: SELECT b.pt_id, a.geom, a.insee, a.nom, a.structure, a.gestionnaire, a.modele, a.num_equipe_piq, a.num_equipe_aig, a.num_equipe_gc FROM (athd.t_pt a JOIN athd.t_pt_projection_gc b ON ((a.pt_id = b.pt_id)));

table.name: pt_reference
table.remarks: Attribution des références de point technique fournies par le client
table.viewSql: WITH reference_count AS ( SELECT a_1.reference, count(*) AS reference_count FROM ((athd.t_pt_reference a_1 JOIN athd.t_pt b_1 ON (((a_1.reference)::text = b_1.nom))) JOIN athd.t_pt_etude c_1 ON ((b_1.pt_id = c_1.pt_id))) GROUP BY a_1.reference ) SELECT a.reference, CASE WHEN (c.pt_id IS NOT NULL) THEN b.geom ELSE NULL::geometry END AS geom, CASE WHEN (rc.reference_count IS NULL) THEN (0)::bigint ELSE rc.reference_count END AS nb_presence, CASE WHEN ((d.nom IS NULL) AND (c.pt_id IS NOT NULL)) THEN 'HORS ZPM'::text WHEN (c.pt_id IS NOT NULL) THEN d.nom ELSE NULL::text END AS zpm FROM (((((athd.t_pt_reference a LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt b ON (((a.reference)::text = b.nom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt_etude c ON ((b.pt_id = c.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm d ON (st_intersects(d.geom, b.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude e ON ((d.zpm_id = e.zpm_id))) LEFT JOIN reference_count rc ON ((a.reference = rc.reference))) ORDER BY a.reference;

table.name: suivi_blocage
table.remarks: Suivi des zones de blocage
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT ON (sb.id_blocage) sb.id_blocage, a.nro, a.nom AS zpm, c.nom AS commune, sb.createur, sb.date, sb.type, sb.commentaire, sb.service_be, sb.avancement_be, sb.date_prev_be, sb.date_be, sb.service_gc, sb.avancement_gc, sb.date_prev_gc, sb.date_gc, sb.service_tvx, sb.avancement_tvx, sb.date_prev_tvx, sb.date_tvx, sb.date_cloture, sb.geom, sb.commentaire_be, sb.commentaire_gc, sb.commentaire_tvx, sb.service_projet, sb.avancement_projet, sb.commentaire_projet, sb.date_prev_projet, sb.date_projet, sb.service_tiers, sb.commentaire_tiers, sb.date_prev_tiers, sb.date_tiers, sb.avancement_tiers FROM (((athd.t_suivi_blocage sb LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm a ON (st_intersects(sb.geom, a.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_suivi b ON ((a.zpm_id = b.zpm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.commune c ON (st_intersects(sb.geom, c.geom)));

table.name: suivi_ca
table.remarks: Suivi par ZPM des CA puis par FCI une fois déclaré
table.viewSql: WITH requete AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN (c_1.fci IS NOT NULL) THEN c_1.fci ELSE i.nom END AS fci, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN (a_1.structure = 'APPUI'::text) THEN a_1.pt_id ELSE NULL::integer END) AS nb_pt_appui, count(DISTINCT CASE WHEN (a_1.structure = 'CHAMBRE'::text) THEN a_1.pt_id ELSE NULL::integer END) AS nb_pt_chambre, CASE WHEN (c_1.fci IS NOT NULL) THEN st_collect(a_1.geom) ELSE i.geom END AS geom, c_1.zpm FROM ((((athd.t_pt a_1 JOIN athd.t_pt_etude b_1 ON ((a_1.pt_id = b_1.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.ca c_1 ON (((b_1.pt_id = c_1.pt_id_a) OR (b_1.pt_id = c_1.pt_id_b)))) JOIN athd.t_zpm i ON (st_intersects(i.geom, a_1.geom))) JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude g ON ((i.zpm_id = g.zpm_id))) WHERE (a_1.gestionnaire = 'ORANGE'::text) GROUP BY c_1.fci, i.nom, i.geom, c_1.zpm ) SELECT DISTINCT requete.fci, COALESCE(requete.zpm, requete.fci) AS zpm, (sum(requete.nb_pt_appui))::integer AS nb_pt_appui, (sum(requete.nb_pt_chambre))::integer AS nb_pt_chambre, CASE WHEN (length(requete.fci) = 12) THEN st_buildarea(st_exteriorring(st_buffer(st_buffer(st_simplify(st_concavehull(st_collect(st_buffer(requete.geom, (0.0001)::double precision)), (0.99)::double precision), (0.0001)::double precision), ('-0.0001'::numeric)::double precision), (10)::double precision))) ELSE st_collect(requete.geom) END AS geom, d.etude_pro_date_prev, d.etude_pro_date, d.liaison_date_prev, d.liaison_date, COALESCE(a.prod_ressource, b.prod_ressource) AS prod_ressource, COALESCE(a.prod_envoi, b.prod_envoi) AS prod_envoi, COALESCE(a.prod_prev, b.prod_prev) AS prod_prev, COALESCE(a.prod_reception, b.prod_reception) AS prod_reception, COALESCE(a.prod_controle, b.prod_controle) AS prod_controle, COALESCE(a.prod_commentaire, b.prod_commentaire) AS prod_commentaire, COALESCE(a.owf_go_depose, b.owf_go_depose) AS owf_go_depose, COALESCE(a.owf_depose, b.owf_depose) AS owf_depose, COALESCE(a.owf_validation, b.owf_validation) AS owf_validation, COALESCE(a.owf_abandon, b.owf_abandon) AS owf_abandon FROM ((((requete LEFT JOIN athd.t_suivi_ca a ON ((a.fci = requete.fci))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_suivi_ca b ON ((b.fci = requete.zpm))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm c ON ((c.nom = requete.zpm))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_suivi d ON ((c.zpm_id = d.zpm_id))) GROUP BY requete.fci, requete.zpm, a.prod_ressource, b.prod_ressource, a.prod_envoi, b.prod_envoi, a.prod_prev, b.prod_prev, a.prod_reception, b.prod_reception, a.prod_controle, b.prod_controle, a.prod_commentaire, b.prod_commentaire, a.owf_go_depose, b.owf_go_depose, a.owf_depose, b.owf_depose, a.owf_validation, b.owf_validation, d.etude_pro_date_prev, d.etude_pro_date, a.owf_abandon, b.owf_abandon, d.liaison_date_prev, d.liaison_date;

table.name: suivi_comac
table.remarks: Suivi par ZPM des COMAC puis par artère une fois déclaré
table.viewSql: WITH requete AS ( SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE(c_1.artere, i.nom) AS artere, CASE WHEN (c_1.artere IS NOT NULL) THEN st_collect(a_1.geom) ELSE i.geom END AS geom, count(a_1.pt_id) AS nb_comac, c_1.zpm FROM ((((athd.t_pt a_1 JOIN athd.t_pt_etude b_1 ON ((a_1.pt_id = b_1.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.comac c_1 ON ((b_1.pt_id = c_1.pt_id))) JOIN athd.t_zpm i ON (st_intersects(i.geom, a_1.geom))) JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude g ON ((i.zpm_id = g.zpm_id))) WHERE (((a_1.gestionnaire = 'ENEDIS'::text) OR (a_1.gestionnaire = 'AODE'::text)) AND (a_1.structure = 'APPUI'::text)) GROUP BY c_1.artere, i.nom, i.geom, c_1.zpm ) SELECT DISTINCT requete.artere, COALESCE(requete.zpm, requete.artere) AS zpm, (sum(requete.nb_comac))::integer AS nb_comac, CASE WHEN (length(requete.artere) > 11) THEN st_buildarea(st_exteriorring(st_buffer(st_buffer(st_simplify(st_concavehull(st_collect(st_buffer(requete.geom, (0.0001)::double precision)), (0.99)::double precision), (0.0001)::double precision), ('-0.0001'::numeric)::double precision), (10)::double precision))) ELSE st_collect(requete.geom) END AS geom, d.etude_pro_date_prev, d.etude_pro_date, d.liaison_date_prev, d.liaison_date, COALESCE(a.prod_ressource, b.prod_ressource) AS prod_ressource, COALESCE(a.prod_envoi, b.prod_envoi) AS prod_envoi, COALESCE(a.prod_prev, b.prod_prev) AS prod_prev, COALESCE(a.prod_reception, b.prod_reception) AS prod_reception, COALESCE(a.prod_controle, b.prod_controle) AS prod_controle, COALESCE(a.prod_commentaire, b.prod_commentaire) AS prod_commentaire, COALESCE(a.eplan_go_depose, b.eplan_go_depose) AS eplan_go_depose, COALESCE(a.eplan_depose, b.eplan_depose) AS eplan_depose, COALESCE(a.eplan_validation, b.eplan_validation) AS eplan_validation, COALESCE(a.eplan_abandon, b.eplan_abandon) AS eplan_abandon FROM ((((requete LEFT JOIN athd.t_suivi_comac a ON ((a.artere = requete.artere))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_suivi_comac b ON ((b.artere = requete.zpm))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm c ON ((c.nom = requete.zpm))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_suivi d ON ((c.zpm_id = d.zpm_id))) GROUP BY requete.artere, requete.zpm, a.prod_ressource, b.prod_ressource, a.prod_envoi, b.prod_envoi, a.prod_prev, b.prod_prev, a.prod_reception, b.prod_reception, a.prod_controle, b.prod_controle, a.prod_commentaire, b.prod_commentaire, a.eplan_go_depose, b.eplan_go_depose, a.eplan_depose, b.eplan_depose, a.eplan_validation, b.eplan_validation, d.etude_pro_date_prev, d.etude_pro_date, a.eplan_abandon, b.eplan_abandon, d.liaison_date_prev, d.liaison_date;

table.name: suivi_comp_releve
table.remarks: Suivi des compléments de relevé (piquetage, RBAL, aiguillage, etc)
table.viewSql: SELECT a.comp_id, a.geom, a.zpm, a.date_affectation, a.demandeur, a.type, a.sous_type, a.motif, a.equipe, a.date_prev, a.date_realisation, a.commentaire, b.etude_pro_date_prev, b.etude_exe_date_prev FROM ((athd.t_suivi_comp_releve a LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm c ON (((a.zpm)::text = c.nom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_suivi b ON ((b.zpm_id = c.zpm_id)));

table.name: znro_etude
table.remarks: ZNRO utilisées en étude (doit être remplacé par znro_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: SELECT b.znro_id, a.geom, b.za_code, b.za_type, b.za_nbel, b.za_com, b.za_comment, b.za_creadat, b.za_majdat, b.secteur, b.etr FROM (athd.t_znro a JOIN athd.t_znro_etude b ON ((a.znro_id = b.znro_id)));

table.name: znro_etude_auto
table.remarks: ZNRO utilisées en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.znro_id, a.geom, b.za_code, 'NRO'::text AS za_type, c.pt_nbel AS za_nbel, e.id AS za_com, b.za_comment, b.za_creadat, b.za_majdat, NULL::text AS secteur, NULL::text AS etr FROM ((((athd.t_znro a JOIN athd.t_znro_etude b ON ((a.znro_id = b.znro_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_nro_etude c ON ((b.za_code = c.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_nro d ON ((c.nro_id = d.nro_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.commune e ON (st_intersects(d.geom, e.geom)));

table.name: znro_georeso
table.remarks: ZNRO présentes dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.znro_id, b.geom, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.nb_el, b.nb_module, b.commentair, b.nom_nro, b.code_pf, b.type_pf, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.rome_ok, b.nb_potenti, b.nb_module_, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.code_ze, b.reseau, b.type_calcu, b.id_ftth FROM (athd.t_znro a JOIN athd.t_znro_georeso b ON ((a.znro_id = b.znro_id)));

table.name: zone_aiguillage

table.name: zpa_etude
table.remarks: ZPA utilisées en étude (doit être remplacé par zpa_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpa_id, a.geom, b.za_code, b.za_type, b.za_capa, b.za_nbel, b.za_nbel_2, b.za_ptam, b.za_com, b.za_comment, b.za_creadat, b.za_majdat, b.annee, b.zanro, b.zapm, b.secteur, b.etr, b.za_umftte, b.za_umftth FROM (athd.t_zpa a JOIN athd.t_zpa_etude b ON ((a.zpa_id = b.zpa_id)));

table.name: zpa_etude_auto
table.remarks: ZPA utilisées en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpa_id, a.geom, b.za_code, 'PA'::text AS za_type, c.cbl_ent AS za_capa, c.pt_nbel AS za_nbel, c.pt_nbel_2 AS za_nbel_2, g.za_code AS za_ptam, h.id AS za_com, b.za_comment, b.za_creadat, b.za_majdat, NULL::text AS annee, j.za_code AS zanro, g.za_code AS zapm, f.type AS secteur, NULL::text AS etr, b.za_umftte, b.za_umftth FROM (((((((((athd.t_zpa a JOIN athd.t_zpa_etude b ON ((a.zpa_id = b.zpa_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_bo_etude c ON ((b.za_code = c.pt_code))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_bo d ON ((d.bo_id = c.bo_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pt e ON ((e.pt_id = d.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm f ON (st_intersects(e.geom, f.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude g ON ((g.zpm_id = f.zpm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.commune h ON (st_intersects(e.geom, h.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro i ON (st_intersects(e.geom, i.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro_etude j ON ((j.znro_id = i.znro_id)));

table.name: zpa_georeso
table.remarks: ZPA présentes dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpa_id, b.geom, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.nb_el, b.nb_module, b.commentair, b.nom_nro, b.code_pf, b.type_pf, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.rome_ok, b.nb_potenti, b.nb_module_, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.code_ze, b.reseau, b.type_calcu, b.id_ftth FROM (athd.t_zpa a JOIN athd.t_zpa_georeso b ON ((a.zpa_id = b.zpa_id)));

table.name: zpb_etude
table.remarks: ZPB utilisées en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpb_id, a.geom, b.za_code, sum(e.ad_nbeltot) AS za_nbeltot FROM ((((athd.t_zpb a JOIN athd.t_zpb_etude b ON ((a.zpb_id = b.zpb_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_lgmt c ON (st_intersects(c.geom, a.geom))) JOIN athd.t_lgmt_etude d ON ((c.lgmt_id = d.lgmt_id))) JOIN athd.t_lgmt_piquetage e ON ((c.lgmt_id = e.lgmt_id))) GROUP BY b.zpb_id, a.geom, b.za_code;

table.name: zpb_georeso
table.remarks: ZPB présentes dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpb_id, b.geom, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.nb_el, b.nb_module, b.commentair, b.nom_nro, b.code_pf, b.type_pf, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.rome_ok, b.nb_potenti, b.nb_module_, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.code_ze, b.reseau, b.type_calcu, b.id_ftth FROM (athd.t_zpb a JOIN athd.t_zpb_georeso b ON ((a.zpb_id = b.zpb_id)));

table.name: zpm_client
table.remarks: ZPM provenants du client / donnée avant vente

table.name: zpm_etude
table.remarks: ZPM utilisées en étude (doit être remplacé par zpm_etude_auto)
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpm_id, a.geom, a.zone, a.nro, a.ancien_nro, a.nom, a.type, b.objectid_1, b.za_code, b.za_type, b.za_capa, b.za_nbel, b.za_ptam, b.za_com, b.cout, b.za_creadat, b.za_majdat, b.annee, b.zanro, b.secteur, b.surface_km, b.priseskm2, b.za_nbel_2, b.ecart, b.objectid_2, b.objectid, b.za_comment, b.etr, b.prises_km2, b.shape_leng, b.shape_le_1, b.shape_le_2, b.shape_area FROM (athd.t_zpm a JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude b ON ((a.zpm_id = b.zpm_id)));

table.name: zpm_etude_auto
table.remarks: ZPM utilisées en étude
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpm_id, a.geom, a.zone, a.nro, a.ancien_nro, a.nom, a.type, b.za_code, 'PM'::text AS za_type, b.za_capa, c.pt_nbel AS za_nbel, f.za_code AS za_ptam, g.id AS za_com, NULL::text AS cout, b.za_creadat, b.za_majdat, NULL::text AS annee, f.za_code AS zanro, a.type AS secteur, NULL::text AS surface_km, NULL::text AS priseskm2, b.za_nbel_2, NULL::text AS ecart, NULL::text AS objectid_2, NULL::text AS objectid, b.za_comment, NULL::text AS etr, NULL::text AS prises_km2, NULL::text AS shape_leng, NULL::text AS shape_le_1, NULL::text AS shape_le_2, NULL::text AS shape_area FROM ((((((athd.t_zpm a JOIN athd.t_zpm_etude b ON ((a.zpm_id = b.zpm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pm_etude c ON ((b.za_code = c.pt_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_pm d ON ((d.pm_id = c.pm_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro e ON (st_intersects(d.geom, e.geom))) LEFT JOIN athd.t_znro_etude f ON ((e.znro_id = f.znro_id))) LEFT JOIN athd.commune g ON (st_intersects(d.geom, g.geom)));

table.name: zpm_georeso
table.remarks: ZPM présentes dans Georeso
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpm_id, b.geom, a.zone, a.nro, a.ancien_nro, a.nom, a.type, b.gid, b.code, b.statut, b.statut_lib, b.nb_el, b.nb_module, b.commentair, b.nom_nro, b.code_pf, b.type_pf, b.code_insee, b.dept, b.auteur, b.date_creat, b.date_modif, b.rome_ok, b.nb_potenti, b.nb_module_, b.source_bas, b.source_oid, b.code_ze, b.reseau, b.type_calcu, b.id_ftth FROM (athd.t_zpm a JOIN athd.t_zpm_georeso b ON ((a.zpm_id = b.zpm_id)));

table.name: zpm_suivi
table.remarks: Suivi global du projet par ZPM
table.viewSql: SELECT b.zpm_id, a.geom, a.zone, a.nro, a.ancien_nro, a.nom, a.type, a.priorite, b.blocage, b.mail_pre_rbal_date, b.mail_pre_rbal_retour, b.rbal_date_prev, b.rbal_date, b.rbal_mairie_date, b.rbal_mairie_date_validation, b.rbal_client_date_prev, b.rbal_client_date, b.rbal_client_ressource, b.rbal_client_date_refus, b.rbal_client_date_validation, b.piquetage_date_prev, b.piquetage_date, b.piquetage_ressource, b.aiguillage_date_prev, b.aiguillage_date, b.aiguillage_ressource, b.etude_pro_date_prev, b.etude_pro_date, b.etude_pro_ressource, b.etude_pro_date_depose, b.etude_pro_date_refus, array_length(b.etude_pro_date_depose, 1) AS etude_pro_version, b.etude_pro_date_validation_eng, b.etude_pro_date_validation_ran, b.etude_pro_transport_date_prev, b.etude_pro_transport_date, b.etude_pro_transport_ressource, b.etude_pro_transport_date_depose, b.etude_pro_transport_date_refus, array_length(b.etude_pro_transport_date_depose, 1) AS etude_pro_transport_version, b.etude_pro_transport_date_validation_eng, b.etude_pro_transport_date_validation_ran, b.liaison_date_prev, b.liaison_date, b.liaison_ressource, b.fiab_opt_date_prev, b.fiab_opt_date, b.fiab_gc_date_prev, b.fiab_gc_date, b.ca_date_prev, b.ca_date, b.comac_date_prev, b.comac_date, b.apd_gc_date_prev, b.apd_gc_date, b.nego_fiche_impl_sro_date_prev_envoi, b.nego_fiche_impl_sro_date_envoi, b.nego_fiche_impl_sro_date_refus, b.nego_fiche_impl_sro_date_validation, b.nego_elagage_releve_date_prev, b.nego_elagage_releve_date, b.nego_elagage_date_prev_envoi, b.nego_elagage_date_envoi, b.nego_elagage_date_refus, b.nego_elagage_date_validation, b.nego_convention_date_prev_envoi, b.nego_convention_date_envoi, b.nego_convention_date_refus, b.nego_convention_date_validation, b.etude_exe_date_prev, b.etude_exe_date, b.etude_exe_ressource, b.etude_exe_date_depose, b.etude_exe_date_refus, array_length(b.etude_exe_date_depose, 1) AS etude_exe_version, b.etude_exe_date_validation_eng, b.etude_exe_date_validation_ran, b.etude_exe_transport_date_prev, b.etude_exe_transport_date, b.etude_exe_transport_ressource, b.etude_exe_transport_date_depose, b.etude_exe_transport_date_refus, array_length(b.etude_exe_transport_date_depose, 1) AS etude_exe_transport_version, b.etude_exe_transport_date_validation_eng, b.etude_exe_transport_date_validation_ran, b.go_travaux_date_prev, b.go_travaux_date, b.go_travaux_ressource, b.gc_date_prev, b.gc_date, b.cmd_cable, b.cmd_mat_optique, b.travaux_date_prev, b.travaux_date, b.pre_doe_date_prev, b.pre_doe_date, b.pre_doe_ressource, b.pre_doe_date_depose, b.pre_doe_date_refus, array_length(b.pre_doe_date_depose, 1) AS pre_doe_version, b.pre_doe_date_validation, b.dft_date_prev, b.dft_date, b.aat_date_prev, b.aat_date, b.doe_date_prev, b.doe_date, b.doe_ressource, b.doe_date_depose, b.doe_date_refus, array_length(b.doe_date_depose, 1) AS doe_version, b.doe_date_validation, b.doe_transport_date_prev, b.doe_transport_date, b.doe_transport_ressource, b.doe_transport_date_depose, b.doe_transport_date_refus, array_length(b.doe_transport_date_depose, 1) AS doe_transport_version, b.doe_transport_date_validation, b.commentaire FROM (athd.t_zpm a JOIN athd.t_zpm_suivi b ON ((a.zpm_id = b.zpm_id)));
